languages.text: "Любой из числа благородных домов, расположенных на Даргонусе! Семейство Драйвстем, которое возглавляю я, семейство Гапрак, связанное давними узами с Адептус Механикус, семейство Зауэрбэк, известное своей набожностью и старательностью в служении... Вероятно, я должен упомянуть и семью Версериан, которые располагают некоторым влиянием, но по сути своей не принадлежат к благородным. Каждый род сочтет честью представить вас на церемонии".

"Any of the noble houses located on Dargonus! The Drivestem family, which I lead; the Gaprak family, with long ties to the Adeptus Mechanicus; the Sauerbacks, known for their piety and diligence in service... Perhaps I should also mention the Werserians, who have some influence, but who are not actually of noble origin. Any one of these houses would be honoured to represent you at the ceremony."
languages.original_text: "Любой из числа благородных домов, расположенных на Даргонусе! Семейство Драйвстем, которое возглавляю я, семейство Гапрак, связанное давними узами с Адептус Механикус, семейство Зауэрбэк, известное своей набожностью и старательностью в служении... Вероятно, я должен упомянуть и семью Версериан, которые располагают некоторым влиянием, но по сути своей не принадлежат к благородным. Каждый род сочтет честью представить вас на церемонии".

traits.locale_text: "Any of the noble houses located on Dargonus! The Drivestem family, which I lead; the Gaprak family, with long ties to the Adeptus Mechanicus; the Sauerbacks, known for their piety and diligence in service... Perhaps I should also mention the Werserians, who have some influence, but who are not actually of noble origin. Any one of these houses would be honoured to represent you at the ceremony."

"Any of the noble houses located on Dargonus! The Drivestem family, which I lead; the Gaprak family, with long ties to the Adeptus Mechanicus; the Sauerbacks, known for their piety and diligence in service... Perhaps I should also mention the Werserians, who have some influence, but who are not actually of noble origin. Any one of these houses would be honoured to represent you at the ceremony."

"Any of the noble houses located on Dargonus! The Drivestem family, which I lead; the Gaprak family, with long ties to the Adeptus Mechanicus; the Sauerbacks, known for their piety and diligence in service... Perhaps I should also mention the Werserians, who have some influence, but who are not actually of noble origin. Any one of these houses would be honoured to represent you at the ceremony."

languages.text: “位于达戈努斯的任何贵族家族都可以！包括我领导的德莱夫斯塔家族，与机械修会有长期合作关系的贾帕克家族，以虔诚与勤奋而著称的苏尔贝克家族……或许我也应该提一下韦尔森家族。他们也有一定程度的影响力，但他们实际上并非贵族出身。上述任意一个家族，都会很乐意在仪式上荣幸地成为您的代表。”
languages.original_text: "Any of the noble houses located on Dargonus! The Drivestem family, which I lead; the Gaprak family, with long ties to the Adeptus Mechanicus; the Sauerbacks, known for their piety and diligence in service... Perhaps I should also mention the Werserians, who have some influence, but who are not actually of noble origin. Any one of these houses would be honoured to represent you at the ceremony."

traits.locale_text: “位于达戈努斯的任何贵族家族都可以！包括我领导的德莱夫斯塔家族，与机械修会有长期合作关系的贾帕克家族，以虔诚与勤奋而著称的苏尔贝克家族……或许我也应该提一下韦尔森家族。他们也有一定程度的影响力，但他们实际上并非贵族出身。上述任意一个家族，都会很乐意在仪式上荣幸地成为您的代表。”

languages.text: «¡Cualquiera de las casas nobles de Dargonus! Está la familia Drivestem, de la que soy líder; la familia Gaprak, unida por un estrecho vínculo al Adeptus Mechanicus; la familia Sauerback, conocida por su piedad y diligencia... y supongo que también están los Werserian, que tienen algo de influencia pese a no ser de origen noble. Cualquiera de estas casas se sentiría honrada de representarle durante la ceremonia».
languages.original_text: "Any of the noble houses located on Dargonus! The Drivestem family, which I lead; the Gaprak family, with long ties to the Adeptus Mechanicus; the Sauerbacks, known for their piety and diligence in service... Perhaps I should also mention the Werserians, who have some influence, but who are not actually of noble origin. Any one of these houses would be honoured to represent you at the ceremony."

traits.locale_text: «¡Cualquiera de las casas nobles de Dargonus! Está la familia Drivestem, de la que soy líder; la familia Gaprak, unida por un estrecho vínculo al Adeptus Mechanicus; la familia Sauerback, conocida por su piedad y diligencia... y supongo que también están los Werserian, que tienen algo de influencia pese a no ser de origen noble. Cualquiera de estas casas se sentiría honrada de representarle durante la ceremonia».

languages.text: 「ダルゴナスにある貴族家系であればいずれも可能です！私が率いるドライブステム家、帝国技術局と長く関係を持つギャプラック家、信心深さと勤勉さで知られるザウアーバック家…また、ある程度の影響力はありますが貴族の出身ではないウェルザリアン家も挙げられますな。このような家のいずれかが、御身を代表して就任式に出席することを光栄に思うでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Any of the noble houses located on Dargonus! The Drivestem family, which I lead; the Gaprak family, with long ties to the Adeptus Mechanicus; the Sauerbacks, known for their piety and diligence in service... Perhaps I should also mention the Werserians, who have some influence, but who are not actually of noble origin. Any one of these houses would be honoured to represent you at the ceremony."

traits.locale_text: 「ダルゴナスにある貴族家系であればいずれも可能です！私が率いるドライブステム家、帝国技術局と長く関係を持つギャプラック家、信心深さと勤勉さで知られるザウアーバック家…また、ある程度の影響力はありますが貴族の出身ではないウェルザリアン家も挙げられますな。このような家のいずれかが、御身を代表して就任式に出席することを光栄に思うでしょう」

languages.text: "Sämtliche Adelshäuser auf Dargonus! Die Familie Drivestem, die ich anführe, die Gapraks mit engen Verbindungen zum Adeptus Mechanicus, die Sauerbacks, bekannt für ihre Frömmigkeit und ihre Dienstbeflissenheit ... Vielleicht sollte ich auch die Werserians erwähnen, die einigen Einfluss haben, aber kein echter Adel sind. Für jedes dieser Häuser wäre es eine Ehre, Euch bei der Zeremonie zu repräsentieren."
languages.original_text: "Any of the noble houses located on Dargonus! The Drivestem family, which I lead; the Gaprak family, with long ties to the Adeptus Mechanicus; the Sauerbacks, known for their piety and diligence in service... Perhaps I should also mention the Werserians, who have some influence, but who are not actually of noble origin. Any one of these houses would be honoured to represent you at the ceremony."

traits.locale_text: "Sämtliche Adelshäuser auf Dargonus! Die Familie Drivestem, die ich anführe, die Gapraks mit engen Verbindungen zum Adeptus Mechanicus, die Sauerbacks, bekannt für ihre Frömmigkeit und ihre Dienstbeflissenheit ... Vielleicht sollte ich auch die Werserians erwähnen, die einigen Einfluss haben, aber kein echter Adel sind. Für jedes dieser Häuser wäre es eine Ehre, Euch bei der Zeremonie zu repräsentieren."

languages.text: « N'importe laquelle des maisons nobles basées sur Dargonus ! La maison Drivestem, dont je suis à la tête ; la famille Gaprak qui entretient des liens avec l'Adeptus Mechanicus ; les Sauerback, connus pour leur piété et leur diligence... Je devrais également mentionner les Werserian, qui exercent une certaine influence, mais qui ne sont pas d'origine noble à proprement parler. N'importe laquelle de ces maisons sera bien entendu très honorée de vous représenter à la cérémonie. »
languages.original_text: "Any of the noble houses located on Dargonus! The Drivestem family, which I lead; the Gaprak family, with long ties to the Adeptus Mechanicus; the Sauerbacks, known for their piety and diligence in service... Perhaps I should also mention the Werserians, who have some influence, but who are not actually of noble origin. Any one of these houses would be honoured to represent you at the ceremony."

traits.locale_text: « N'importe laquelle des maisons nobles basées sur Dargonus ! La maison Drivestem, dont je suis à la tête ; la famille Gaprak qui entretient des liens avec l'Adeptus Mechanicus ; les Sauerback, connus pour leur piété et leur diligence... Je devrais également mentionner les Werserian, qui exercent une certaine influence, mais qui ne sont pas d'origine noble à proprement parler. N'importe laquelle de ces maisons sera bien entendu très honorée de vous représenter à la cérémonie. »

languages.text: "Dargonus'ta ikamet eden tüm soylu haneler! Benim liderliğini yaptığım Drivestem ailesi, Adeptus Mechanicus ile güçlü bağları bulunan Gaprak ailesi, imanıyla ve hizmette sergiledikleri gayretle tanınan Sauerbackler... Belki de Werserianları da saymalıyım, aslında soylu bir kökenden gelmeseler de belirli bir nüfuza sahipler. Bu hanelerin hepsi de sizi törende temsil etmekten onur duyar."
languages.original_text: "Any of the noble houses located on Dargonus! The Drivestem family, which I lead; the Gaprak family, with long ties to the Adeptus Mechanicus; the Sauerbacks, known for their piety and diligence in service... Perhaps I should also mention the Werserians, who have some influence, but who are not actually of noble origin. Any one of these houses would be honoured to represent you at the ceremony."

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus'ta yer alan herhangi bir soylu hane! Benim liderliğini yaptığım Drivestem ailesi; Adeptus Mechanicus ile güçlü bağları bulunan Gaprak ailesi; imanıyla ve hizmetlerinde sergiledikleri gayretle tanınan Sauerbackler... Belki de Werserianları da saymalıyım, onlar da belli bir nüfuza sahipler ancak aslında soylu bir kökenden gelmemekteler. Bu hanelerin hepsi de sizi seremonide temsil etmekten onur duyar."
